title: Used the product and I am really satisfied with it

pros: Pros: User friendly interface and great customer support

title: Loyalty Card Program
name: Emil H.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: BakuCard is the first official touristic city card of Baku which offer wide range of discounts and special offers for the tourists of our vibrant capital. Recently we started partnership with Ticketsetup company and using their ticketing system in order to implement online sales of our products, especially BakuCard tourist cards. The whole experience is very positive as the representatives of Ticketsetup company are able to assist every time we need their support 24/7.
cons: Cons: For now there haven't been experienced any issues in our partnership, hope this strong partnership will be constant in future.
overall: Overall: On behalf of Baku Tourism Information Center and BakuCard project we are very satisfied with the whole services provided by Ticketsetup company.

title: Superb experience!
name: Suleyman A.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros:
Pros: Friendly interface and easy setup.

Especially service fee made me happy:-)
cons: Cons: It would be better to make available "brand free" also for regular package.
overall: Overall: Running a marketplace was never so easy. Thanks to Ticketsetup, our clients collect their fees and control participant flow.

title: Easy, Fast, Secure and Reliable.
name: Orkhan A.
pros: Pros: It is easy to manage event tickets. To implement your own design on tickets. Platform can send tickets to email by PDF or even make it printable. The support team is really helpful and solve all the problems fast.
cons: Cons: It took some time to connect the chosen payment gateway to the account. But mainly because of the API problems on the payment gateway side.
overall: Overall: As a Blockchain Center of Azerbaijan we do organize events, meetups and hackathons each month. We have tried some other platforms but at the end decided to work with Ticketsetup, because it has everything we need.
